description: This file contains CSS styles for a browser-based Snake game frontend, including theme management and responsive design.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with responsive styles and theming.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the logo with animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including layout and positioning.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, including color transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button with hover and active effects.
